metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7106 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cacti 1.2.8 has stored XSS in data_sources.php, color_templates_item.php, graphs.php, graph_items.php, lib/api_automation.php, user_admin.php, and user_group_admin.php, as demonstrated by the description parameter in data_sources.php (a raw string from the database that is displayed by $header to trigger the XSS). It was discovered that Cacti has a XSS vulnerability. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause uriparser to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: cacti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
